naslov: Zadar - Crno mediteranska villa 176m2 sa bazenom 980000€ (prodaja)

Zadar - Crno Mediterranean style villa with a heated pool of 32m2! Living area of 176m2 on a plot of 451m2. The carefully decorated facility consists of: - kitchen, - living room / lounge, - 3 bedrooms, - entertainment room / gym, - wine-cellar / summer kitchen / grill. All rooms are air conditioned, including bedrooms. The location is very quiet and oriented towards south. It is located close to the airport and highway, and Zadar is also a few minutes away. Excellent tourist profitability! Brokerage fee in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions. The entire purchase/sale process is managed by our authorized law office.
